SENT.plain: 89 aged patients with different clinical forms of dementia (senile, vascular, Pick's disease, Alzheimer's disease) were examined
There appeared 4 variants of preclinical development of dementia: cerebroasthenic, dysmnesic, rigidity of thinking, psychopathy-like condition)
On the basis of these symptom complexes early diagnosis of mental disturbances is possible in general geriatric population
